Name: St. Patrick's Day Cocktail
Ingredients: 10 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
10 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of mint leaf (or shamrock).
Garnish with mint leaf (or shamrock) pegged to rim.
Review: Verdant, vibrant, and virtuous - so virtuous that it's saintly! Faintly minty, herbal, and citrusy with whiskey making it a helluva craic.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly in London, England. (Better if it had been Dublin or Belfast!)
Nutrition: One serving of St. Patrick's Day Cocktail contains 207 calories
